Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1965...
Traded from New York (A) to Kansas City on 6/24/1967 (Going to KCA: 2B G. Nettles. Going to NYY: 1B J. Mayberry Sr., 1B R. Skidmore)...
Had first career hit on 7/17/1967, off Dean Chance (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/28/1967, off Tom Seaver (CHW)...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/1/1975 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
